title: Map Sampler, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk and wool embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem, satin and running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Oval map of Scotland, England and Wales.  The wool fabric is over plain weave cotton.  Some of the embroidery is through two layers; some through one.

tombstone.epitaph:
Map Sampler, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk and wool embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem, satin and running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-64.
